job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: Job Title: Senior Software EngineerLocation: Philadelphia, PA or New York, NYRequired Technology And Skills5 years of software development experience with focus on web-based applications and full-stack development for both customer facing UI and backend servicesExperience developing software in LAMP stack with PHP preferable utilizing Symfony.Experience developing with a UI framework, Ember.js preferred or React and Anuglar Experience with Linux configurationSome experience with different PHP runtimes Hands on experience with relational databases â MySQL preferred. Prefer database design and query developmentExperience maintaining and improving distributed systemsNice To Have SkillsExperience developing a REST API.Knowledge of Docker and containers.Experience working with AWS services Experience with CI/CD preferred JenkinsSalary And Compensation$120,000-$140,000BonusBenefits And PerksAbility to work remote401K matchClientOur client is a Fortune 500 firm that specialize in software solutions for the edtech and health tech spacePlease email jpillion@talener.com for more information or to apply.
